## hpr2192 :: Fun with Oscilloscopes

 For an example of the effect, here is an example -

Jerobeam Fenderson - Deconstruct
Link to the original TechMoan video that got me interested in the subject
Oscilloscope Music and Blender - a video by one of the originators of the technique
Jerobeam Fenderson - original Oscilloscope music artist
Oscilloscope Music Website
Software Oscilloscope - basically an oscilloscope emulator


Here are some other interesting ideas for oscilloscopes -

Video on an Oscilloscope
Quake on an Oscilloscope
